SET(MSROUTER_TARGET msrouter)
SET(MSROUTER_SOURCES dsarchive.c msrouter.c)
SET(MSROUTER_HEADERS dsarchive.h)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../libmseed)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(msrouter ${MSROUTER_HEADERS} ${MSROUTER_SOURCES})

INSTALL(TARGETS msrouter
	RUNTIME DESTINATION ${SDP_BIN_DIR}
	ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
	LIBRARY DESTINATION ${SDP_LIB_DIR}
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${MSROUTER_TARGET} mseed)
